page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LEE
page.content: Every day is just a normal day in Bowburn.My mam calls me down at about 7.30.She asks me what I would like for breakfast,today I had toast with some stawberry jam on.After breakfast I clean my teeth and dress.When I am ready I pack my bag ready for school.When I get to school I play football with my friends.At 9.00 we go into school.Our teacher first marks the register.Then we have assembly,but we dont on Mondays.After assembly we have maths for about 45 min,then it is playtime,but somedays like today my friend and I are on door duty.After play we have English.then it is dinner time.Today we will be having P.E.After school I play football with my brother,sister and my friends.When I come in I watch the television then go to bed at 9.00.{LEE SMITH 3, GEORGE {STREET, BOWBURN. }
